statements: SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT location, sum(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteDisposalData GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE location = 'New York' AND quantity > 100;
SELECT waste_type, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM WasteDisposalData GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT disposal_date, location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WasteDisposalData GROUP BY location HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%' AND quantity > 50 ORDER BY disposal_date
SELECT location, waste_type, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM WasteDisposalData GROUP BY location, waste_type ORDER BY location, waste_type
SELECT disposal_date, location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalData WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC
SELECT event_date, location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalEvents;
SELECT event_date, location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalEvents WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPlans;
SELECT plan_date, target_reduction, action_items FROM WasteManagementPlans ORDER BY plan_date ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, location, waste_type, quantity FROM WasteDisposalEvents WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT plan_id, plan_date, location, target_reduction FROM WasteManagementPlans ORDER BY target_reduction DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalEvents WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT plan_id, COUNT(plan_id) as num_plans FROM WasteManagementPlans GROUP BY plan_id HAVING num_plans > 1
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Data;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_weight FROM Waste_Disposal_Data ORDER BY disposal_weight DESC;
SELECT disposal_type, COUNT(*) AS disposal_count FROM Waste_Disposal_Data GROUP BY disposal_type;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Data WHERE disposal_weight > 1000;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_type, disposal_weight FROM Waste_Disposal_Data WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Data;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_weight FROM Waste_Disposal_Data ORDER BY disposal_weight DESC;
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_type FROM Waste_Disposal_Data WHERE disposal_weight > 1000;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location FROM Waste_Disposal_Data WHERE disposal_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM Waste_Disposal_Trends INNER JOIN Waste_Management_Strategies ON Waste_Disposal_Trends.trend_id = Waste_Management_Strategies.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location, disposal_capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY disposal_capacity DESC;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY amount_disposed ASC;

SELECT wd.site_name, wh.disposal_year, wr.amount_disposed FROM waste_disposal_sites wd JOIN waste_disposal_records wr ON wd.site_id = wr.site_id JOIN waste_disposal_history wh ON wr.record_id = wh.record_id WHERE wr.amount_disposed > 1000;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT record_id, waste_type, amount_disposed FROM waste_disposal_records ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, disposal_type, disposal_capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_type='Landfill';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE waste_type='Plastic' AND amount_disposed > 1000;
SELECT history_id, disposal_year, disposal_month, disposal_quantity FROM waste_disposal_history WHERE disposal_quantity BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY disposal_year ASC, disposal_month DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, city, state FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT event_id, event_date, total_collected_volume FROM waste_collection_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT type_name, category FROM waste_types WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, total_collected_volume FROM waste_collection_events
SELECT site_name, city, state, zip_code FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT type_name, category, disposal_method FROM waste_types ORDER BY type_name DESC
SELECT site_name, city, state, zip_code, event_date FROM waste_disposal_sites JOIN waste_collection_events ON waste_disposal_sites.site_id = waste_collection_events.site_id
SELECT * FROM waste_management_strategies WHERE description LIKE '%recycling%'
